One [Emery]1077-emery [I]678-i rolled [my]678-i shoulders twice and yawned . [I]678-i hated being at [the office]202-the office this early . It was mind - numbing , but at least [I]678-i got to see [Mitch]54-mitch . [He]54-mitch did n’t have class for another hour , and [I]678-i figured [we]203-we could use that time to get some coffee … or just occupy [[his]54-mitch office]202-the office . [I]678-i could think of a few things that [I]678-i preferred to working . [My]678-i feet carried [me]678-i straight down the hallway of [the history building at [the University of [Texas]2-texas]1-the university of texas , [Austin]1648-austin]204-the history building at the university of texas , austin . It might be a bit taboo that [he]54-mitch was also [[my]678-i professor]54-mitch and the advisor for [[my]678-i PhD]206-my phd , but it worked for [me]678-i . [Her]207-her skirt was hiked up ; [I]678-i could tell even from [my]678-i vantage point . [My]678-i stomach dropped out of [my]678-i body . This could not be happening . [I]678-i could not be this naive . “ What the fuck is going on here ? ”[678-i] [I]678-i demanded . One too many panic attacks , [my]678-i first ever prescription for [Xanax]58-xanax , and a dissertation topic that seemed perpetually out of reach had done [me]678-i in . Screw academia . [I]678-i drove [my]678-i Subaru Forester back to [[my]678-i one - bedroom studio]217-my apartment , cursing [Austin]1648-austin traffic the whole way . How was it possible for there to be bumper - to - bumper traffic at all times ? Three years ’ worth of neglect had taken over [[my]678-i apartment]217-my apartment , and [my]678-i head ached from just imagining what to do with it all . At that moment , [my]678-i life was completely open before [me]678-i . No obligations . No job . No future . [I]678-i rolled [my]678-i eyes at [my]678-i own ridiculous thoughts and began to stuff half of [[my]678-i closet]217-my apartment into the two suitcases [I]678-i had . An hour later , [I]678-i tucked [my]678-i MacBook into [my]678-i leather bag , remembered to grab [my]678-i phone and computer charger , and kissed [Austin]1648-austin good - bye . [I]678-i ’d eventually have to come back for the rest of [my]678-i shit , but for now , [I]678-i was going to forget all about [Mitch]54-mitch , kick up the Christmas tunes , and drive the six hours [home]218-home to [Lubbock]1645-lubbock . As if that was all there was in [west Texas]2-texas . It was [a city of [three hundred thousand people]223-three hundred thousand people]222-a city of three hundred thousand people , for [Christ]61-christ ’s sake !
